results.content: Very similar to the instructor's "1-Hour JavaScript" course in that it covers a basic introduction to CSS that will give someone unfamiliar with CSS a good idea of what CSS can do for HTML.  Once again, the instructor does a good job delivering an hour's worth of content in a clear and concise manner.  While an hour won't make you a pro, it will get you started and get you familiar with what CSS is all about.
results.content_html: Very similar to the instructor's "1-Hour JavaScript" course in that it covers a basic introduction to CSS that will give someone unfamiliar with CSS a good idea of what CSS can do for HTML. Once again, the instructor does a good job delivering an hour's worth of content in a clear and concise manner. While an hour won't make you a pro, it will get you started and get you familiar with what CSS is all about.

results.content:
This course is real gem, I'm a beginner at programming and I could learn almost everything about CSS in this course. It's direct, clear and easy to understand with short lessons that try to explain you all in the best possible way.
5 Starts for you John Bura and whoever is reading this and wants to learn web design and programming, it's the easiest way to get started with such a fantastic language as CSS. Congratulations!
results.content_html:
